definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
character serving as sound value of another character/phonetic

sentences.english: A man near the general muttered “Fringe- squib” under his breath.
sentences.chinese: 將軍聲旁的一位士兵嘀咕諷刺地嘀咕。

sentences.english: Characters in which the phonetic provides no information for pronunciation of the whole character, like phonetic-unknown character.
sentences.chinese: 聲旁不提供漢字讀音的信息，如聲旁不知字。

sentences.english: Characters in which the phonetic provides no information for pronunciation of the whole character, like phonetic-unknown character.
sentences.chinese: 聲旁不提供漢字讀音的信息，如聲旁不知字。
